tool_description: An API for climate change news around India.
name: climatechangenewsapi
title: climatechangenewsapi

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Get news about climate change from a specific news resource.

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about Climate Change of india.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climatechangenewsapi2.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climatechangenewsapi2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climatechangenewsapi2.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climatechangenewsapi2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
